original_title: ならせ！ PUI PUI モルカー＋DRIVING SCHOOL 予習編
overview: The Molcars are back! This time, Potato and the others are brought to driving school after causing a big fuss in the town. Encounters, bonds, and trials await for the squad at this theme park-like place.
title: Pui Pui Molcar: Driving School
